text: Quellorjo (possibly from Quechua q'illu yellow, urqu mountain, "yellow mountain") is a mountain in the Urubamba mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is located in the Cusco Region, Urubamba Province, Ollantaytambo District, northwest of Ollantaytambo. It lies southwest of Yurac Orjo ("white mountain"). ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Cusco Region
title: Quellorjo (Cusco)
